title: Bar Celoneta Sangria Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan, Italian, Organic, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Spanish
description: Bar and restaurant by the beach and has Wi-Fi. Offers organic vegetarian-vegan food with tapas, burgers, salads, raw food, vegan cheese. Also has craft beer, organic beer and local wine, plus fresh juices. Sangria is the house specialty. English version of its menu is on facebook. As of Oct 2015 owner reported everything is vegan.
